original_title: CEB hands over transmission line and grid capacity development plan 2023-2030: Minister
original_body_lines: CEB General Manager Eng. Rohan Seneviratne (right) hands over the 2023-2030 blueprint to Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera

Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera announced receiving the transmission line development and grid capacity development plan of the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) for 2023-2030 on Wednesday.

The strategic blueprint outlines crucial steps to integrate renewable energy, thermal sources, energy storage additions and securing financing for the projects heralding a significant leap towards a stable future.
“Discussed with the CEB officials on the infrastructure development plan to integrate renewable energy additions and financing of the projects,” the Minister tweeted.
